title: tvplus006
author: tvplus006
content: What happened: Ponzi scheme 30% PROFIT FOR 7 DAYSFlag type 1 (support/oppose): https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=trust;flag=2969 Thread Link: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5400271.0 Archived: https://archive.ph/Md3aaScammer Profile Link: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=2811099Website: https://wallaz.online/Archived: https://archive.ph/rQg8uQuoteDomain Name: WALLAZ.ONLINERegistry Domain ID: D293470234-CNICRegistrar WHOIS Server: whois.hostinger.comRegistrar URL: https://www.hostinger.com/Updated Date: 2022-05-08T12:09:57.0ZCreation Date: 2022-04-25T08:26:24.0ZRegistry Expiry Date: 2023-04-25T23:59:59.0Z

comments.author: Charles-Tim
comments.body: Obviously it is a hyip or it would only result to an exit scam with its unrealistic high return profit which is not possible with a legit business.  I think the later is most likely, I mean exit scam immediately as people are investing. I have replied to its scam thread with your post quoted and indicating it to be a scam. I have also given the user that created the thread a bonus of negative trust.

comments.author: edgycorner
comments.body: I reported their website to the hosting provider, and it has been suspended now.If they come back again, then you guys know what to do  Even CDN networks respond to reports now.

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: He made a similar post in Gambling board toohe even knows what he's doing but continues to advertise scamQuote from: Bitcoin_Arena on May 24, 2022, 11:58:24 AMQuote from: makerfans22 on May 23, 2022, 07:00:10 PMThank you for reply the topic first i am not admin but i am user this website and already invest in starter plane with 1000 usdt i want just share my experience with us and about minimum i am not admin to to answar your quotion i think admin till now on trust zone anyway this internet can be steal money in secend and i think this is copy trade site that mean mybe lose anytime and this just my opnionIf you even already know that it's a copy site and people will lose money. Then why are you posting about it here and encouraging users to join?Aren't you being a hypocrite?Quote from: edgycorner on May 28, 2022, 03:09:13 AMI reported their website to the hosting provider, and it has been suspended now.If they come back again, then you guys know what to do  Even CDN networks respond to reports now. Good job, gave you a small push to rank up

comments.author: edgycorner
comments.body: Quote from: Bitcoin_Arena on May 28, 2022, 05:03:16 AMGood job, gave you a small push to rank up  Damn, thanks for your generosity.Feels good to be rewarded

comments.author: SFR10
comments.body: Did some digging and it appears that the above website was only a small piece of a bigger puzzle [unfortunately]:- Almost half of them are being hosted in NameCheap (I highly doubt we'd be able to take those down with our reports)!alphacash.ml [archived - Couldn't find the creation date]rayfundsinvestment.com [archived - Creation Date: 2021-08-13]havaxtradeoptions.com [archived - Creation Date: 2021-10-18]fundfluxinvestment.com [archived - Creation Date: 2020-05-04]investcryptoverse.com [archived - Creation Date: 2022-02-18]legitimatebitrade.com [archived - Creation Date: 2021-12-19]flipinvestmentss.com [archived - Creation Date:2022-03-19]Some similarities with the above websites:brightoptionsinvestment.com [archived - Creation Date: 2020-09-06]markdavsoninvestment.com [archived - Creation Date: 2021-09-13]karioxcapital.com [archived - Creation Date: 2021-08-31]

comments.author: edgycorner
comments.body: Quote from: SFR10 on May 30, 2022, 05:24:07 PMDid some digging and it appears that the above website was only a small piece of a bigger puzzle [unfortunately]:- Almost half of them are being hosted in NameCheap (I highly doubt we'd be able to take those down with our reports)!alphacash.ml [archived - Couldn't find the creation date]rayfundsinvestment.com [archived - Creation Date: 2021-08-13]havaxtradeoptions.com [archived - Creation Date: 2021-10-18]fundfluxinvestment.com [archived - Creation Date: 2020-05-04]investcryptoverse.com [archived - Creation Date: 2022-02-18]legitimatebitrade.com [archived - Creation Date: 2021-12-19]flipinvestmentss.com [archived - Creation Date:2022-03-19]Some similarities with the above websites:brightoptionsinvestment.com [archived - Creation Date: 2020-09-06]markdavsoninvestment.com [archived - Creation Date: 2021-09-13]karioxcapital.com [archived - Creation Date: 2021-08-31]hoeleeeeeee , this is like a ring being run by one people/group to farm ponzi sites on search engines(for better ranking and this how they prey on newbs)I have reported all of them. Hopefully, they will all get suspended soon.

comments.author: TheUltraElite
comments.body: Obviously these are groups of websites being run by the same scammers. They attempt to make sites like this with similar templates and writing and then spread them over social media and telegram cold DMs.No point in entertaining such scammers, if someone gets a link from some random account about investing in these crazy schemes with unimaginable profits, instant block should be the next step.Any of them showing their heads in this forum should also be marked with red tags and flagged.Flag supported from my side.

comments.author: edgycorner
comments.body: One more website is down.European hosting providers are very responsive and suspend accounts within 24 hours of receiving the report.Whereas offshore hosting providers  are "demanding" more proof lolI have written a stern reply, with detailed evidence and how if they fail to suspend these accounts then I will be following up with the Justice department of all countries to get their IP ranges blocked since they harbor fraudsters & fail to act upon abuse reports.

comments.author: SFR10
comments.body: Quote from: edgycorner on May 31, 2022, 02:02:15 AMI have reported all of them. Hopefully, they will all get suspended soon.Quote from: edgycorner on May 31, 2022, 05:52:58 PMOne more website is down.Thank you for reporting them as well... That was surprisingly fast Quote from: edgycorner on May 31, 2022, 05:52:58 PMI have written a stern reply, with detailed evidence and how if they fail to suspend these accounts then I will be following up with the Justice department of all countries to get their IP ranges blocked since they harbor fraudsters & fail to act upon abuse reports.I hope your reports would also work for the ones that use NameCheap services [they've ignored most of my reports in the past year and that's one of the reasons scammers love using their services (they rarely take down websites, even if it's quite obvious they were built to scam greedy and tech-illiterate people)].

comments.author: edgycorner
comments.body: Quote from: SFR10 on June 01, 2022, 06:07:39 AMI hope your reports would also work for the ones that use NameCheap services [they've ignored most of my reports in the past year and that's one of the reasons scammers love using their services (they rarely take down websites, even if it's quite obvious they were built to scam greedy and tech-illiterate people)].As you said, they don't care. Namecheap isn't even responding lol Hostinger keeps on asking for additional evidence even though ponzi scheme is illegal in all jurisdictions.These offshore hosting providers really don't care and these replies by them is hurting my little ego lolI guess this is where they thrive, providing services to scammers. Guess I will create a bot to feed their sign-up pages with fake data constantly and try to DDOS them next week. When I have more time.
